str2: Reuben -- 'behold a son!' oldest son of Jacob, also his desc
Simeon -- a son of Jacob, also his tribe, also an Israelite with a foreign wife
Levi -- a son of Jacob, also the tribe descended from him

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites
